title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify functional (scalability, concurrency, fault tolerance, integration with existing systems) and non-functional requirements (performance benchmarks) of the Distributed Natural Language Processing Engine. Consider edge cases, error handling, and scalability limits.

title: Design Architecture for Distributed System
description: Define the system architecture and components required for a scalable distributed natural language processing engine.

title: Implement Backend Components (RFC-7185)
description: Develop the backend components for natural language processing, text analytics, and language model training. This includes the development of APIs, data handling, integration with other system components, and adherence to RESTful design principles.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for interacting with the distributed natural language processing engine. The interface should include functionality for inputting text, monitoring the processing status, and viewing the results. The frontend should be designed with responsive web design principles to ensure compatibility across various devices.

title: Database Design and Integration
description: Design a scalable, fault-tolerant database schema for the distributed natural language processing engine. This should include performance optimizations for large-scale text analytics, error handling strategies, and ensure compatibility with other components of the system. Integrate this design with the existing architecture. Upon completion, provide a detailed documentation on the database design and its integration process, focusing on explaining the reasoning behind the chosen schema and optimization techniques. Incorporate feedback from the team during the design phase to improve the overall efficiency of the system. Once the design is finalized, conduct thorough testing before proceeding with implementation. If necessary, adjust the design based on testing results. Upon completion, update this RFC with the final database design and any adjustments made during testing.

title: DevOps Configuration and Deployment
description: Set up CI/CD pipelines, configure the system for scalability, deploy the distributed natural language processing engine in a production environment. This task also includes documentation of the deployment process, emphasizing best practices for DevOps, scalability, and security.

title: Unit Testing
description: Write unit tests for the various components of the distributed natural language processing engine.

title: System Integration Testing
description: Perform system integration testing to ensure the different components of the engine work together correctly.

title: Security Review and Implementation
description: Conduct a security review of the distributed natural language processing engine, identify any vulnerabilities, and implement necessary security measures.

title: Documentation and Technical Writing
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the distributed natural language processing engine, including user guides, API references, and development guidelines.
